function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of SARS-CoV-2 virus through droplets and fomites","Impact":"Risk of rapid spread of Covid-19","Mitigation":"Use of personal protective equipment, regular disinfection, and physical distancing","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C disinfection, and contactless delivery systems","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and patients","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, government, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Airborne spread of SARS-CoV-2 virus during aerosol-generating procedures","Impact":"Potential for increased transmission in healthcare facilities","Mitigation":"Proper ventilation, use of HEPA filters, and avoidance of unnecessary aerosol-generating procedures","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, negative pressure rooms, and surgical smoke evacuation systems","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, and visitors","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, infection control departments, and regulatory agencies"},{"Description":"Uncertain role of the faecal-oral route in SARS-CoV-2 transmission","Impact":"Possibility of fecal-oral transmission leading to additional sources of infection","Mitigation":"Enhanced sanitation, proper wastewater management, and hand hygiene promotion","Technologies":"Wastewater treatment systems, touchless fixtures, and UV disinfection of wastewater","People":"General public, sanitation workers, and water management personnel","Owner":"Sanitation departments, water treatment facilities, and public health agencies"}]}
